title: Elevate24 (com.jigsaw24.Elevate24)
description: macOS privilege access management tool from Jigsaw24

LicenseKey.title: License Key (Premium)
LicenseKey.description: Enter your Elevate24 license key. Mandatory key for Premium customers only.

LicenseAPIKey.title: License API Key (Premium)
LicenseAPIKey.description: Enter your Elevate24 license api key. Mandatory key for Premium customers only.

message.title: Message
message.description: Change the standard application message in the application.

iconPath.title: Icon (Premium)
iconPath.description: Prodvide the file path to a JPEG or PNG to use as the icon in the Elevate24 application.

heading.title: Heading (Premium)
heading.description: Change the standard header from Elevate24 in the application. Always displays in bold.

mainbutton.title: Mainbutton Txt (Premium)
mainbutton.description: Change the standard button text from Elevate in the application.

Enabletimelist.title: Enable Choice of Session Times
Enabletimelist.description: Enables the option for the application to display a choice of times. To be used in conjuction with Session Times list.

enableReason.title: Enable free text reason
enableReason.description: Will replace reasons drop down list with a free text entry box.

HideLogo.title: Hide Powered By Jigsaw24 Logo (Premium)
HideLogo.description: Hide the “Powered by Jigsaw24” logo in the application.

Sessiontime.title: Session Time
Sessiontime.description: Change the length of time (in seconds) the user will be elevated for. Do not use this key if you want to present a list of times to choose from.

times.title: Session Times
times.description: List of available times to chose from in the Application. Enter time below in seconds.

reasons.title: Reasons
reasons.description: The reasons to choose for needing elevated rights in dropbox within the application.

DisableDefaultLog.title: Disable Default Log (Premium)
DisableDefaultLog.description: To disable sending of premium reporting data to Jigsaw24. If you are a basic customer, no data is sent from the device, it is all stored locally.

enableAppleAuth.title: Apple Auth (Premium)
enableAppleAuth.description: Prompts the user for their local Apple credentials or TouchID (if enabled on device) before allowing elevation.

GoogleAuth.title: Google Auth (Premium)
GoogleAuth.description: Enables the use of authenticator applications such as Google Auth or Microsoft Auth, prompting for a valid session token before Elevating to admin.

standardAtLoad.title: Standard At Load
standardAtLoad.description: Will remove admin rights when the application first launches.

demoteAllAdmin.title: Demote All Admin
demoteAllAdmin.description: Enables all admin users being demoted to standard users when the current elevation period ends. If you have any accounts on the device you'd like to remain admin please configure Demote Exclusions.

userElevateAdmin.title: User Elevate Admin (Premium)
userElevateAdmin.description: Will create a temporary secondary account instead of Elevating the primary account. A temporary password will also be supplied upon elevation.

useCurrentUserAsAdmin.title: Use Current User As Admin (Premium)
useCurrentUserAsAdmin.description: If User Elevate Admin Key is enabled and this key is also enabled, the temporary account will use the current logged in users username as part of the account naming. For example, Joe.Bloggs-adm

adminUserName.title: Admin User Name (Premium)
adminUserName.description: If ‘Use Current User As Admin’ is not enabled, this key allows the ability to create a temporary admin account with a standard name.

demoteAllAdminQuit.title: Demote All Admin Quit
demoteAllAdminQuit.description: Will demote all admin accounts from admin when the application quits or the laptop is restarted.

killterminalsessions.title: Kill Terminal Sessions
killterminalsessions.description: Will demote the current terminal session from sudo session to standard.

demoteExclusions.title: Demote Exclusions
demoteExclusions.description: Will exclude accounts on device from being demoted.

ComplexPassword.title: Complex Password (Premium)
ComplexPassword.description: Enables the use of a custom complex password when 'User Elevate Admin' is enabled.

PasswordUppercase.title: Password Uppercase (Premium)
PasswordUppercase.description: Enter the amount of uppercase Letters required for the password.

PasswordLowercase.title: Password Lowercase (Premium)
PasswordLowercase.description: Enter the amount of lowercase Letters required for the password.

PasswordNumbers.title: Password Numbers (Premium)
PasswordNumbers.description: Enter the amount of numbers required for the password.

PasswordSymbols.title: Password Symbols (Premium)
PasswordSymbols.description: Enter the amount of symbols required for the password.

showAdminPasswordGrace.title: Show Admin Password Grace (Premium)
showAdminPasswordGrace.description: Set the number of seconds after elevation or last showing the password that the password will be shown (Max 45 seconds). This only works if 'User Elevate Admin' is enabled.
